thread.title: Dantonio shoots down talk about South Carolina job
thread.title_full: Dantonio shoots down talk about South Carolina job

author: detroitnews.com
title: Dantonio shoots down talk about South Carolina job
text:
Mark Dantonio (Photo: Dale G. Young, Detroit News) 
East Lansing -- Steve Spurrier's announcement that he was resigning as South Carolina's football coach on Tuesday would seem to have little impact on anything happening in East Lansing.
But it didn't take long for Mark Dantonio's name to come up as a possible successor at his alma mater, and right out the gate on Tuesday he was asked about the opening.
"Coach Spurrier has had an outstanding career there; it's my alma mater," Dantonio said. "We're here to talk about Michigan."
Dantonio was a defensive back at South Carolina from 1976-78.
DETROIT NEWS
Dantonio: No reason MSU, UM can't both be great
